documentation.title: Switch Declaration
documentation.standard: Case statements must be followed by exactly one space.

code.title: Valid: Case statement followed by one space.
Invalid: Case statement not followed by one space.

documentation.standard: There must be no whitespace between the case value or default keyword and the colon.

code.title: Valid: Colons not preceded by whitespace.

documentation.standard: Terminating statements must be indented four more spaces from the case statement.

code.title: Invalid: Break statement not indented four spaces.

documentation.standard: There must be a comment when fall-through is intentional in a non-empty case body.

code.title: Valid: Comment marking intentional fall-through in a non-empty case body.
Invalid: No comment marking intentional fall-through in a non-empty case body.
